description: Travel day from Kyoto to Osaka - final Kyoto morning and Osaka arrival

activities.description: Arrive in Osaka, check into hotel
First exploration of Osaka - Dotonbori area

transportation: Shinkansen or express train Kyoto to Osaka
meals: Breakfast: Kyoto, Lunch: On train, Dinner: Osaka street food
notes: Dotonbori is famous for food and neon lights. Try takoyaki, okonomiyaki, and other Osaka specialties.
